title: Cerezo Osaka U-23
text:
Cerezo Osaka Under−23 was a <a href="List%20of%20football%20clubs%20in%20Japan">Japanese football team</a> based in <a href="Osaka">Osaka</a>. It was the reserve team of <a href="Cerezo%20Osaka">Cerezo Osaka</a> and played in <a href="J3%20League">J3 League</a> which they have done since their entry to the league at the beginning of the <a href="2016%20J3%20League">2016 season</a>. They played the majority of their home games at <a href="Kincho%20Stadium">Kincho Stadium</a>.
History.
Cerezo Osaka joined <a href="J3%20League">J3 League</a> in 2016 along with the reserve teams of neighbours <a href="Gamba%20Osaka">Gamba Osaka</a> and <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a>. None of these clubs are eligible for promotion to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> additionally they can only field 3 players over the age of 23.
Current squad.
"As of 6 September 2020".
